title: My Neighbor Totoro
plot_summary: Satsuke and her younger sister, Mei, as they settle into an old country house with their father and wait for their mother to recover from an illness in an area hospital. As the sisters explore their new home, they encounter and befriend playful spirits and their house and the nearby forest, most notably massive cuddly creature known as Totoro

characters.name: Mei
characters.roles: the four-year-old protagonist little sister of Satsuki
characters.description: is a bold, happy girl, without any dark shadow sin her personality.

characters.name: Satsuki
characters.roles: protaganist and older sister of Mei
characters.description: is a bright and cheerful individual. Also has short, walnut brown hair and chocolate brown eyes.

characters.name: Totoro
characters.description: is a remnant member of Totoro Tribe which is at brink of extinction due to ancient battles against humanity.

settings.name: Old House Rural Japan
settings.description: The girls arrive at the rather dilapidated but charming old house and discover that it might be haunted – much to their delight. When little soot sprites scoot out of the dark corners of the house, the girls get to work dusting and filling the house with laughter and light.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
plot_summary: Sophie, a young milliner and eldest of three sisters, encounters a wizard named Howl on her way to visit her sister Lettie. Upon returning home, she meets the Witch of the Waste, who transforms her into a 90-year-old woman. Seeking to break the curse, Sophie leaves home and sets off through the countryside.

characters.name: Wizard Howl
characters.roles: male protagonist and a powerful wizard living in the land of Ingary
characters.description: Howl has shoulder-length straight flaxen blonde hair, light blue eyes, and a pale complexion. He is tall and slender. Very vain, for a plain looking man with mud-colored hair.

characters.name: Sophie Hatter
characters.description: Sophie, age 18, has red-gold hair and blue-green eyes. She is considered to be rather pretty, although she doesn't perceive herself as such. She primarily wears the color grey, but this changes as her confidences grows

characters.name: Miss Angorian
characters.roles: The Witch of the Waste is the main antagonist and an attractive school teacher in Wales that woos Wizard Howl.
characters.description: Shes a beautiful young woman, with shiny black hair, olive skin, and big eyes.

settings.name: Ingary
settings.description: Ingary is the name of the country and setting in the film, Howl's Moving Castle. Its capital is located in Kingsbury, and some of its major cities include Market Chipping and Porthaven.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
plot_summary: 13-year-old Kiki moves to a seaside town with her talking cat, Jiji, to spend a year alone, in accordance with her village's tradition for witches in training. After learning to control her broomstick, Kiki sets up a flying courier service and soon becomes a fixture in the community. But when the insecure young witch begins questioning herself and loses her magic abilities, she must overcome her self-doubt to get her powers back.

characters.name: Kiki
characters.description: is a young girl who sets out to complete a one-year training to become a full-fledged witch.

characters.name: Jiji
characters.description: Jiji is a sardonic and sarcastic black cat who acts as a Foil and sidekick to Kiki. He comes along with her to the town

characters.name: Tombo
characters.description: The deuteragonist, who tries to befriend Kiki after watching her fly on her broomstick. A little annoying, but ultimately sweet guy and a Gadgeteer Genius.

characters.name: Osono
characters.description: A warm-hearted and kindly baker. Osono takes in Kiki and becomes a bit of a mother figure to the young witch.

settings.name: European Metropolis
settings.description: The story takes place in an alternative 1950s Europe where WWI and WWII never happened. The fictional city of Kokoro has one side on the shores of the Mediterranean and the other on the Baltic Sea.

title: Spirited Away
plot_summary: 10-year-old Chihiro and her parents  stumble upon a seemingly abandoned amusement park. After her mother and father are turned into giant pigs, Chihiro meets the mysterious Haku , who explains that the park is a resort for supernatural beings who need a break from their time spent in the earthly realm, and that she must work there to free herself and her parents.

characters.name: Chihiro
characters.description: Chihiro made her debut in the movie as a whiny and petulant 10-year-old little girl, yet eventually becomes a brave and selfless small girl.

characters.name: Haku
characters.description: A mysterious, secretive boy of about sixteen who can take the form of a flying dragon.

characters.name: Yobaba
characters.description: A witch who runs the bathhouse and gives Chihiro a job. Yubaba is strict, greedy, and quick to anger, but she’s also fair and a stickler for following the rules of the spirit world.

characters.name: Lin
characters.description: The main female bathhouse worker. Lin is initially gruff with Chihiro but comes to admire her and act as her big sister.

characters.name: No-Face
characters.description: A sad, voiceless spirit. When No-Face tries to repay Sen for her kindness to him, the results are disastrous. He takes on a frog/worker’s voice after he eats the worker.

settings.name: Ornate bathhouse
settings.description: Small door next to the bath tub.

title: Ponyo
plot_summary: A charming fairy tale about a goldfish who becomes a girl and a little boy who loves her and introduces her with pride to his world of wonders.

characters.name: Ponyo
characters.description: She is a goldfish born from the sea goddess Granmamare and a human named Fujimoto. She is known to love Sōsuke and ham.

characters.name: Fujimoto
characters.description: is slender and appears to be 40-years old, but he may have lived much longer. He claims he was once human, which implies he underwent some changes in order to become the wizard he is now. This may be a clue as to why he has strange, bird-like markings on his cheekbones and around his eyes.

characters.name: Sosuke
characters.description: is a 5-year-old boy who wears a sunshine yellow t-shirt and chocolate brown shorts. His hair is walnut brown with his hair shaven underneath. Also, he wears a sailor hat and binoculars.

settings.name: Tomonoura
settings.description: A small harbour town on the shores of Japan’s Inland Sea, the Setonaikai. A commercial hub for centuries, changes to modern forms of transport must have suddenly upended Tomonoura’s economy, leaving her citizens without the money to change or rebuild their home. The result is a quiet, well-preserved city, with charming shops, and streets to wander.

title: The Secret World of Arrietty
plot_summary: Arrietty, a tiny teenager, lives with her parents in the recesses of a suburban home, unbeknown to the homeowner and housekeeper. Like others of her kind, Arrietty remains hidden from her human hosts, but occasionally ventures forth from beneath the floorboards to borrow sugar cubes and other supplies. A secret friendship forms when 12-year-old Shawn meets Arrietty, but their relationship could spell danger for Arrietty's family.

characters.name: Arrietty
characters.description: a 14-year-old girl with shoulder-length auburn hair and black eyes.

characters.name: Sho
characters.description: is shown to be a quiet and very polite boy. However, he is initially listless and pessimistic about his operation, as he has no will to live, thinking that every living person will die, eventually, and he also has a low chance of survival from the operation.

characters.name: Spiller
characters.description: is dark skinned with white stripes on both sides of his cheeks. His hair is uneven and spiky, most likely showing he doesn't cut it. His height is not determined but he is shorter than Arrietty. He is slightly muscly and has a sharp face.

characters.name: Haru
characters.description: Haru wears a brown trousers and orange shirt with beige apron. She wears green glasses and has short, messy brown hair. Her skin is white and she's fairly plump.

settings.name: Western Tokyo
settings.description: The estate is comprised of a small house amid a sprawling green landscape.

title: The Wind Rises
plot_summary: A lifelong love of flight inspires Japanese aviation engineer Jiro Horikoshi, whose storied career includes the creation of the A6M World War II fighter plane.

characters.name: Jiro
characters.description: has dark brown hair, brown eyes and black glasses. He wears a suit comprised of a white coat with a blue tie, white pants and white hat

characters.name: Naoko
characters.description: Happy, fun, and spirited, she fist meets Jiro when she saves his hat from flying away on the breeze.

settings.name: Tokyo
settings.description: Tokyo before and after the Great Kantō Earthquake in 1923, and several locations in Nagano Prefecture, namely in Karuizawa and the Fujimi Kogen Sanatorium. Unlike previous Ghibli works, The Wind Rises is based on the real-life experiences of author Tatsuo Hori and aviation engineer Jirô Horikoshi.

title: Fireworks
plot_summary: This film tells the story of a schoolgirl who finds a pretty transparent ball by the sea, on the day of a fireworks display of a religious festival in a seaside town in Japan. She plans to run away from home to escape from her unhappy home, as her mother is about to remarry for the third time. However, her escape fails until her male classmate finds out the supernatural power that the transparent ball has

characters.name: Nazuna
characters.description: A female student whose father died after the divorce. Though she does not have friends, she falls in love with Norimichi.

characters.name: Norimichi
characters.description: A male student learning that fireworks are flat.

settings.name: Seaside Village
settings.description: A small seaside village during the summer, and the day we repeat is the day of a summer fireworks festival at the town’s lighthouse (thus the kids’ argument about flat vs round fireworks).

title: A Silent Voice
plot_summary: A grade-school student with a hearing impairment is bullied and transfers to another school. Years later, the former bully is tormented by his behaviour and sets out to make amends.

characters.name: Shoya
characters.description: lived life in a constant war against boredom, often acting rowdy and mischievous in an effort to keep himself amused.

characters.name: Shoko
characters.description: Shōko had a strong desire to connect with people around her. However, due to difficulties in communication, she was often met with misunderstanding, disinterest, or bullying.

settings.name: Ogaki
settings.description: Oima’s hometown Ogaki, in Gifu Prefecture, the story proper begins at elementary school when Shoko Nishymiya  arrives as a transfer student.

title: Your Name
plot_summary: Two teenagers share a profound, magical connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies. Things manage to become even more complicated when the boy and girl decide to meet in person.

characters.name: Taki
characters.description: A young man with an average build and height who is noted for being handsome with spiky nape-length brown hair that has bangs covering his forehead and dark blue eyes. At times, he is seen wearing band-aids because of his impulsive personality.

characters.name: Mitsuha
characters.description: A teenage girl of an average build and height who is described as very beautiful and the spitting image of her late mother Futaba Miyamizu with straight upper-back length black hair that she wears in a unique hair-do; two braids on each side tied into a small ponytail with a red, blue and yellow-orange-colored braided cord with bangs hanging on the left side while she has chin-length hair strands hanging on either side and brown eyes.

settings.name: Itomori, Tokyo
settings.description: Mitsuha Miyamizu is a high school student in the rural town of Itomori, Japan. Bored of the town, she wishes to be a Tokyo boy in her next life. Soon, she begins to intermittently switch bodies with Taki Tachibana, a boy from Tokyo.

title: Hello World
plot_summary: A man travels in time from the year 2027 to relive his school years and to correct a bad decision.

characters.name: Naomi
characters.description: A 16-year-old high school student living in 2027 Kyoto and the film's protagonist. Initially lacking confidence and decisiveness, he is chosen by his classmates to be a book committee member and whereupon meets and grows close to Ruri. He slowly develops as a person across the film and becomes braver and more steadfast.

characters.name: Ruri
characters.description: Naomi Katagaki's classmate and a fellow book committee member. Unlike Naomi, she is old-fashioned, decisive and confident in her choices, even if they make her stand out.

settings.name: Kyoto
settings.description: In Kyoto in the year 2027, Naomi Katagaki, a male high school student encounters a person who claiming to be Naomi from 10 years in the future. Together, they must change the future and save a classmate, Ruri, whom the younger Naomi starts to date in three months.

title: Wolf Children
plot_summary: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident, a woman must find a way to raise the son and daughter that she had with him. However, their inheritance of their father's traits prove to be a challenge for her.

characters.name: Yuki
characters.description: Yuki was very energetic and happy-go-lucky. Venturous, she liked to explore the outside world, run around and chase small prey.

characters.name: Ame
characters.description: Ame was a very timid boy. Unlike his sister Yuki, he preferred to stay at home and close to his mom, Hana, instead of venturing around.

characters.name: Wolf Man
characters.description: Little is known about Wolf Man. He seemed to be a calm but nice man who was shown to have a strong paternal instinct, probably due to his wolf instinct. Like any other wolf or wild animal, he preyed for food, for the survival of his mate and offspring.

characters.name: Hana
characters.description: Hana is a very optimistic and up-beat young woman who has gone through her fair share of hardships.

settings.name: Kunitachi
settings.description: Kunitachi is a city located in the western portion of Tōkyō Metropolis, in the central Kantō region of Japan. This is where the "Hokushin Dry Cleaners" and the "Hakujūji" stores are located, as well as the "Asahi Children's Hospital" and the "UOTA Animal Hospital".

title: Garden of Words
plot_summary: When a lonely teenager decides to miss his morning lessons in favour of sitting in a lovely garden, he meets a mysterious older woman who shares his feelings of alienation.

characters.name: Yukari
characters.description: is one of the main characters in The Garden of Words, as well as a minor character in Your Name.

characters.name: Takao
characters.description: is one of the main characters in The Garden of Words. He is a fifteen-year-old high school student and an aspiring shoemaker. On rainy mornings, he skips school and builds a close relationship with Yukari Yukino.

settings.name: Shinjuku Park in central Tokyo
settings.description: Set in contemporary Tokyo, it's the story of a schoolboy, Takao, who's in the habit of walking through a park on wet days, when the rain gives a magic appearance to the green retreat.

title: Whisper of Heart
plot_summary: Shizuku, an inquisitive young girl and a voracious reader, who longs to be a writer when she grows up. One day she notices that all of her library books have previously been taken out by one Seiji Amasawa. Amid chasing after a large cat, befriending an eccentric antiques dealer and writing her first novel, Shizuku aims to find this mysterious boy who may well be her soul mate.

characters.name: Seiji
characters.description: Seiji has short, dark hair and white skin. His eyebrows are brown and his eyes are dark, the same black/brown color of his hair. His face is long and his forehead is wide, his chin ending with a point.

characters.name: The Baron
characters.description: He is a very skilled fighter and a swordman to be able to overwhelm two soldiers at once.

characters.name: Shizuku
characters.description: A slender fourteen years old girl with short umber brown hair which reaches slightly below her ears and the same colored eyes, although it looks black due to the animation style.

settings.name: Tama City
settings.description: The film is set in Tama City in western Tokyo. One day Shizuku notices a large cat at the station, which she follows around the hilly town.

title: Ride Your Waves
plot_summary: Surf-loving college student Hinako must find joy and purpose in life again, after a terrible tragedy results in the death of her firefighter boyfriend Minato.

characters.name: Hinako
characters.description: Hinako is a tall young woman with brown eyes. Her height is 175cm. Her over the shoulders hair, typically tied up in a bun, is a light brown hair. Casually, she wears a orange and white striped flowy short sleeved cardigan. Along with a loose light yellow t-shirt and rolled light blue shorts with white open toed shoes.

characters.name: Minato
characters.description: He is a kind boy who likes to care about others before himself. He has a strong sense of justice, and his team trusts him. Many people believe that he knows how to do everything, but to achieve such efforts he had to work hard.

characters.name: Wasabi
characters.description: A light-brown messy haired male with green eyes. His height is rather average. Towards the end of the movie, his hair can be seen cut far shorter.

settings.name: Seaside City
settings.description: Relocating to Chiba to begin university studies in oceanography, avid surfer Hinako finds herself right at home in the seaside city, where she can hit the waves anytime after just a short bike ride down to the beach.

title: Josee, The Tiger and the Fish
plot_summary: Tsuneo is a university student, and Josee is a young girl who has rarely gone out of the house by herself due to her being unable to walk. The two meet when Tsuneo finds Josee's grandmother taking her out for a morning walk.

characters.name: Josee
characters.description: A fair-skinned girl with wavy shoulder-length light-brown hair that is usually seen loose, but she sometimes has a different style such as half of it pulled up with short, squarish bangs hanging above her eyebrows, her eyes are large and their irises a pink-purple, with rather thick upper eyelashes; three more prominent ones protruding slightly to either side, some blush on her cheeks and she has a slender figure.

characters.name: Tsuneo
characters.description: Tall and slim, he has medium length straight black hair and light green eyes.

settings.name: Osaka
settings.description: The anime is set in Osaka. Tsuneo Suzukawa is a 22-year-old university student studying marine biology. He works part-time at a diving shop, where he bonds with coworkers Mai and Hayato. On his way home after a lecture, he saves a paraplegic young woman named Kumiko Yamamura, who insists on being called "Josee".

title: Ocean Waves
plot_summary: As he journeys back from Tokyo to his high school for a reunion, Taku Morisaki recounts his memories of his school days, focussing in particular on a love triangle that developed between him and two of his friends.

characters.name: Taku
characters.description: Taku, needing money for the school's trip to Hawaii, took his restaurant busboy job to offset the expense, at the cost of falling grades and his teachers' disapproval. He can be blunt to the point of tactlessness. After graduating from high school, he went on to a university in Tokyo and stayed in an apartment near Shakujii Park (石神井公園, Shakujii Kōen). His parents' live in Mt. Godai, Kōchi City.

characters.name: Rikako
characters.description: Due to familial problems, Rikako moved from Tokyo to Kōchi to be with her mother's parents. She's a pretty second-year high schooler (eleventh grader) with an excellent academic record and is active in sports, but is not good at socializing. She hardly participates in class activities and has only one friend, Yumi Kohama. After graduating from high school, she took the entrance exam for Kōchi University and passed, but she also secretly took the entrance exam for a women's college in Tokyo and attended that instead.

characters.name: Yukata
characters.description: Taku's friend and rival for Rikako's affections. Yutaka and Taku became friends when they jointly campaigned against the cancellation of their junior high school trip due to the school's low test scores. After graduating from high school, he enrolled at Kyoto University ( "National University of Kyoto" in the anime).

settings.name: City of Kōchi
settings.description: The film is set in the city of Kōchi, and follows a love triangle that develops between two good friends and a new girl who transfers to their high school from Tokyo.
